WYSIWYM.model
Class QueryValue

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.QueryValue

public class QueryValue
extends Object

Contains the value(s) of a datatype query node, and their comparators and boolean operators

Version:
1.2 08-02-2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

realise

public String realise(boolean any,
                      OntologyReader reader)
Returns the nl-representation of this value For number nodes for 'any property', realise 'a number less than 2' or 'the number 3'

Parameters:
any - If true, return realisation for 'any property'
reader - Ontology
Returns:
String

getAnyPropertyNP

public static DTNode getAnyPropertyNP(int i)
Returns an NP for the phrase 'a date' or 'a number', null for all other datatypes.

Parameters:
i - integer with datatype. If 0, treat as a date; if 1, treat as a number.
Returns:
DTNode containing Noun Phrase

getAnyPropertyNP

public DTNode getAnyPropertyNP()
Returns an NP for the phrase 'a date' or 'a number', return null for all other datatypes

DTNode containing Noun Phrase
